ol.li: All mobile equipment including attachments (side shift devices, jibs, extension tines, etc.) must be formally documented in a register.
Ensure that mobile equipment is registered, inspected, and certified in accordance with local legislative requirements.
Ensure that the safe working load tag/rating plate is displayed on all mobile equipment and confirm compliance with periodic inspections.

Undertake periodic inspections, testing, and maintenance of mobile equipment using a competent person. Inspections must be documented and include structural and mechanical elements, refer to relevant standards for guidance.

Undertake pre-operation inspections to ensure equipment is safe to use before operating. Follow tag-out procedures and remove equipment from service if damaged, unsafe, or does not meet compliance specifications.
